item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 8:15 PM UTC
item.description:

10. Einstein's Other Theory of Everything (122 points | 50 comments)
11. The web's clipboard, and how it stores data of different types (126 points | 17 comments)

14. Texan used Apple AirTags to discover plastics in Houston aren't being recycled (53 points | 26 comments)

21. In This Beautiful Library, Bats Guard the Books (11 points | 2 comments)

27. Americans' love affair with big cars is killing them (151 points | 172 comments)
